app.Enternumberofcoinsforprediction: Enter number of points to predict with
app.PredictionisnowclosedItwillreopenonTuesd: Prediction is now closed. Next match day predictions will be available by the end of this matchday.
app.Enterthecodeunderthebottlecap: Enter the code under the bottle cap
app.Predictthematchscoreandearnyourcoins: Predict the match score and earn your points
app.predictClosing: Submission will be closed 1 hour before the game week starts
app.RankingDesc: Below is your rank among everyone else in the game sorted according to achieved score
app.aboutGameDescription: Predict the match score to collect points and become one of the top scorers to attend a Premiere League match with Coca Cola.
app.predictAndWinDescription: Enter the number of points you would like to play with & predict the upcoming matchday’s score. Based on the match results, your points will either be multiplied in case of correct prediction or remain as is if your prediction is incorrect.
app.predictAndWinDescription2: Predictions will be closed before the upcoming match day by 1 hour.
app.predictAndWinDescription3: Teams are divided into two levels:
app.AccordingToResults: According to your prediction and the match results, your points will be multiplied according to the below:
app.MatchResults1: • In case the match includes teams from the same level (ex: Manchester City vs. Liverpool):
app.MatchResults2: • In case the match includes teams from the different levels (ex: Manchester City vs. Wolves):
app.guessingInitialScore: If you predicted the winning team correctly but incorrect score, your points will be multiplied by 3.
app.guessingInitialScore2: If you predicted the winning team and the score correctly, your points will be multiplied by 5.
app.guessingInitialScore3: If you predicted a draw but the incorrect score (ex: predicted 2:2 but score is 3:3), your points will be multiplied by 3.
app.guessingInitialScore4: If you predicted a draw and the score correctly, your points will be multiplied by 5.
app.guessingInitialScore5: If you predicted the winning team (from level 1) correctly but incorrect score, your points will be multiplied by 2.
app.guessingInitialScore6: If you predicted the winning team (from level 1) and the score correctly, your points will be multiplied by 4.
app.guessingInitialScore7: If you predicted the winning team (from level 2) correctly but incorrect score, your points will be multiplied by 4.
app.guessingInitialScore8: If you predicted the winning team (from level 2) and the score correctly, your points will be multiplied by 6.
app.guessingInitialScore9: If you predicted a draw but the incorrect score (ex: predicted 2:2 but score is 3:3), your points will be multiplied by 4.
app.guessingInitialScore10: If you predicted a draw and the score correctly, your points will be multiplied by 6.
app.drinkAndWinDesc: Buy Coca Cola can (330ml), put your code and win 50 points to increase your chances of winning.

Buy Coca Cola can (330ml), insert the code inside the cap and win 
 points to increase your chances of winning.
 Win 500 points instead of 50 till the 20th of January. 
 Hurry up and buy your Coca Cola can!
app.drinkAndEarn: Drink your favorite coke and earn more points.
app.findingGift: You will find the code in 330ml coke cans
app.homePredictDes1: Predict the match score to collect points and become one of the top scorers to attend a Premiere League match with Coca Cola.
app.homePredictDes2: Enter the number of points you would like to play with & predict the upcoming matchday’s score. Based on the match results, your points will either be multiplied in case of correct prediction or remain as is if your prediction is incorrect.
app.homeDrinkDes1: Increase your chance to win by drinking 330 ml can and earn points instantly.
Increase your chances to win by drinking 330 ml can and earn points instantly. Win 500 points instead of 50 till the 20th of January
